nodes.text: Reebak, originally nicknamed Brown Eyes, was a female tauntaun on Hoth. Prior to the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, she was rescued from a fall by Sergeant Maxim and trained as a mount for the Rebel Alliance. During the battle, Maxim rode Reebak, charging a squad of snowtroopers and an E-Web heavy repeating blaster. When the Rebel forces evacuated, Maxim insisted that they take Reebak with them aboard their GR-75 medium transport.
Reebak appeared in "Tales from Wild Space: A Tauntaun Tail", the backup story in the Star Wars Adventures 22, released June 5, 2019.
